channel.title: JBoss Issue Tracker
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [ENTESB-921] fabric create fails with Error executing command: No matching service for optional OSGi service reference
item.description:
With jboss-fuse-full-6.1.0.redhat-110.zip fabric create returns:

Error executing command: No matching service for optional OSGi service reference: (objectClass=org.fusesource.fabric.api.ZooKeeperClusterBootstrap)

I get the following in the log:

JBossFuse:karaf@root> log:display
2013-10-08 12:05:15,563 | INFO | -610110-thread-1 | KarArtifactInstaller | ? ? | 26 - org.apache.karaf.deployer.kar - 2.3.0.redhat-610110 | Karaf archives will be extracted to /Users/kearls/fuse/jboss-fuse-6.1.0.redhat-110/system
2013-10-08 12:05:15,564 | INFO | -610110-thread-1 | KarArtifactInstaller | ? ? | 26 - org.apache.karaf.deployer.kar - 2.3.0.redhat-610110 | Timestamps for Karaf archives will be extracted to /Users/kearls/fuse/jboss-fuse-6.1.0.redhat-110/system/.timestamps
2013-10-08 12:05:15,841 | INFO | -610110-thread-1 | SecurityUtils | ? ? | 34 - org.apache.sshd.core - 0.8.0 | BouncyCastle not registered, using the default JCE provider
2013-10-08 12:05:16,641 | INFO | -610110-thread-1 | core | ? ? | 44 - org.apache.aries.jmx.core - 1.0.1.redhat-610110 | Starting JMX OSGi agent
2013-10-08 12:05:16,674 | INFO | -610110-thread-1 | core | ? ? | 44 - org.apache.aries.jmx.core - 1.0.1.redhat-610110 | Registering MBean with ObjectName [osgi.compendium:service=cm,version=1.3,framework=org.apache.felix.framework,uuid=6c78001a-7fc2-4e3a-9d63-0ca8dc78f926] for service with service.id [13]
2013-10-08 12:05:16,678 | INFO | JMX OSGi Agent | core | ? ? | 44 - org.apache.aries.jmx.core - 1.0.1.redhat-610110 | Registering org.osgi.jmx.service.cm.ConfigurationAdminMBean to MBeanServer com.sun.jmx.mbeanserver.JmxMBeanServer@1d0ca25a with name osgi.compendium:service=cm,version=1.3,framework=org.apache.felix.framework,uuid=6c78001a-7fc2-4e3a-9d63-0ca8dc78f926
2013-10-08 12:05:16,678 | INFO | JMX OSGi Agent | core | ? ? | 44 - org.apache.aries.jmx.core - 1.0.1.redhat-610110 | Registering org.osgi.jmx.framework.PackageStateMBean to MBeanServer com.sun.jmx.mbeanserver.JmxMBeanServer@1d0ca25a with name osgi.core:type=packageState,version=1.5,framework=org.apache.felix.framework,uuid=6c78001a-7fc2-4e3a-9d63-0ca8dc78f926

2013-10-08 12:05:16,679 | INFO | JMX OSGi Agent | core | ? ? | 44 - org.apache.aries.jmx.core - 1.0.1.redhat-610110 | Registering org.osgi.jmx.framework.ServiceStateMBean to MBeanServer com.sun.jmx.mbeanserver.JmxMBeanServer@1d0ca25a with name osgi.core:type=serviceState,version=1.7,framework=org.apache.felix.framework,uuid=6c78001a-7fc2-4e3a-9d63-0ca8dc78f926

item.summary: fabric create fails with Error executing command: No matching service for optional OSGi service reference

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: This looks to be fixed. fabric:create works fine in latest kit jboss-fuse-6.1.0.redhat-137
